scripts.build:android: npm run clean:android && mkdir -p ./android/app/build/intermediates/assets/debug && react-native bundle --dev false --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./android/app/build/intermediates/assets/debug/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/debug && cd android && ./gradlew assemble && cp -r ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/ ./dist
